mapper.select: SELECT t1.id, user_id, username, header_url, title, content, t1.type, t1.status, t1.create_time, comment_count, score FROM (SELECT id, user_id, title, content, type, status, create_time, comment_count, score FROM discuss_post WHERE status != 2 ORDER BY create_time DESC) t1 LEFT JOIN user ON t1.user_id = user.id
